MonsterMission.name: Kill a Husk Immortal
MonsterMission.description: An Anomalous Husk lifeform has appeared between [location1] and [location2].Researchers advise that the only way to dispatch the creature is by overloading its system with poisons or Antibiotics, after that, its demise is only a matter of time. A reward of [reward] has been promised to any crew brave enough subjugate it and administer the lethal substances.

message.text: The target has been eliminated. Navigate the submarine out of the cavern.

MonsterMission.name: Kill a Husk Immortal
MonsterMission.description: An Anomalous Husk lifeform has appeared between [location1] and [location2].Researchers advise that the only way to dispatch the creature is by overloading its system with poisons or Antibiotics, after that, its demise is only a matter of time. A reward of [reward] has been promised to any crew brave enough subjugate it and administer the lethal substances

message.text: The target has been eliminated. Navigate the submarine out of the cavern.

MonsterMission.name: Kill two Husk Immortals
MonsterMission.description: A failed experiment has caused a couple anomalous Husk lifeforms to escape and wander the area around [location1] and [location2].Researchers advise that the only way to dispatch the creature is by overloading its system with poisons or Antibiotics, after that, its demise is only a matter of time. A reward of [reward] has been promised to any crew brave enough subjugate it and administer the lethal substances

message.text: The target has been eliminated. Navigate the submarine out of the cavern.

MonsterMission.name: Terminate a Dybbuk
MonsterMission.description: A particurarly aggressive Dybbuk has been causing severe psychological damage to nearby vessels traveling between [location1] and [location2],A reward of [reward] Marks has been promised to anyone who can eliminate it.

message.text: The target has been eliminated. Navigate the submarine out of the cavern to claim the reward.

MonsterMission.name: Terminate a lone Hydrathresher
MonsterMission.description: A lone Hydrathresher has been spotted in the routes between [location1] and [location2], A reward of [reward] Marks has been promised to any crew capable of eliminating it before it can become a serious threat.

message.text: The target has been eliminated. Navigate the submarine out of the cavern to claim the reward.

MonsterMission.name: Slay a Juvenile Charybdis
MonsterMission.description: A juvenile Charybdis has been attacking vessels traveling between [location1] and [location2], A reward of [reward] Marks has been promised to anyone who can eliminate it.
MonsterMission.successmessage: The Juvenile Charybdis has been terminated.

message.text: The target has been eliminated. Navigate the submarine out of the cavern to claim the reward.

MonsterMission.name: Slay a pack of Juvenile Charybdis
MonsterMission.description: A pack of juvenile Charybdis has been attacking vessels traveling between [location1] and [location2], A reward of [reward] Marks has been promised to anyone who can eliminate them.
MonsterMission.successmessage: The Juvenile Charybdis's has been terminated.

message.text: The target has been eliminated. Navigate the submarine out of the cavern to claim the reward.

MonsterMission.name: Slay an Anomalous Moloch
MonsterMission.description: A Peculiar Moloch specimen has been spotted between [location1] and [location2], its aggressive nature has been detrimental to the trading routes,and as such,A reward of [reward] Marks has been promised to anyone who can eliminate it.

message.text: The target has been eliminated. Navigate the submarine out of the cavern to claim the reward.

MonsterMission.name: Slay an Anomalous Moloch
MonsterMission.description: A Peculiar Moloch specimen has been spotted between [location1] and [location2], its aggressive nature has been detrimental to the trading routes,and as such,A reward of [reward] Marks has been promised to anyone who can eliminate it.

message.text: The target has been eliminated. Navigate the submarine out of the cavern to claim the reward.

MonsterMission.name: Scavenger Galore
MonsterMission.description: Some Scavengers established their territory between [location1] and [location2], and as such they developed an aggressive territorial behaviour, Anyone that clears out the threat will be free to keep whatever they found

message.text: The targets have been eliminated. Navigate the submarine out of the cavern.

MonsterMission.name: Kill a Scavenger
MonsterMission.description: A rogue Scavenger is wandering around the area between [location1] and [location2], The authorities are awarding [reward] marks to anyone who eliminates it. Anyone that kills the creature will be free to keep whatever they found

message.text: The targets have been eliminated. Navigate the submarine out of the cavern.

MonsterMission.name: Scavenger Galore
MonsterMission.description: Some Scavengers established their territory between [location1] and [location2], and as such they developed an aggressive territorial behaviour, Anyone that clears out the threat will be free to keep whatever they found in the Scavengers' bodies

message.text: The targets have been eliminated. Navigate the submarine out of the cavern.

MonsterMission.name: Terminate a Large Thresher swarm
MonsterMission.description: A huge swarm of threshers has been attacking vessels between [location1] and [location2]. Witnesses report also the appearence of less-known thresher lifeforms. A reward of [reward] has been promised to any crew capable of terminating the swarm

message.text: The target has been eliminated. Navigate the submarine out of the cavern.

MonsterMission.name: Terminate a Large Mudraptor swarm
MonsterMission.description: A large swarm of Mudraptors has been attacking vessels between [location1] and [location2]. A reward of [reward] has been promised to any crew capable of terminating the swarm

message.text: The targets has been eliminated. Navigate the submarine out of the cavern.

MonsterMission.name: Terminate a Major Mudraptor swarm
MonsterMission.description: A huge swarm of Mudraptors has been attacking vessels between [location1] and [location2]. Witnesses report also the presence of a veteran Mudraptor. A reward of [reward] has been promised to any crew capable of terminating the swarm

message.text: The targets has been eliminated. Navigate the submarine out of the cavern.

MonsterMission.name: Terminate a Massive Mudraptor swarm
MonsterMission.description: A massive swarm of Mudraptors has been rally up around [location1] and [location2]. Witnesses report a large number of veteran Mudraptors and a Mudbouncer. A reward of [reward] has been promised to any crew capable of terminating the swarm

message.text: The targets has been eliminated. Navigate the submarine out of the cavern.

MonsterMission.name: Terminate a Massive Mudraptor swarm
MonsterMission.description: A massive swarm of Mudraptors has been rally up around [location1] and [location2]. Witnesses report a large number of veteran Mudraptors and a Mudbouncer. A reward of [reward] has been promised to any crew capable of terminating the swarm

message.text: The targets has been eliminated. Navigate the submarine out of the cavern.

MonsterMission.name: Terminate a Massive Thresher swarm
MonsterMission.description: A massive swarm of Threshers has been attacking vessels between [location1] and [location2], effectively stopping all commercial routes. A reward of [reward] has been promised to any crew capable of terminating the swarm

message.text: The target has been eliminated. Navigate the submarine out of the cavern.

MonsterMission.name: Terminate a Massive Thresher swarm
MonsterMission.description: A massive swarm of Threshers has been attacking vessels between [location1] and [location2], effectively stopping all commercial routes. A reward of [reward] has been promised to any crew capable of terminating the swarm

message.text: The target has been eliminated. Navigate the submarine out of the cavern.

MonsterMission.name: Investigating A Missing Shipment
MonsterMission.description: A small shipment of Brute Security Robots has gone missing between [location1] and [location2] a couple of weeks ago.While it was assumed the shipment was lost to the abyss, the Brutes' rescue beacons recently activated.Anyone willing to investigate the beacons will be rewarded
MonsterMission.successmessage: You meet a representative of the company responsible for the production of the Brutes, he introduces himself and gives you [reward] Marks for the "inconvenience"; he then leaves as quickly as he arrived.

message.text: The missing Brutes appears to have been taken over by some sort of parasitic growth, but they have been dispatched . You should report the incident to [location2].

MonsterMission.name: Investigating A Missing Shipment
MonsterMission.description: A large shipment of Brute Security Robots has gone missing between [location1] and [location2] a couple of weeks ago. While it was assumed the shipment was lost to the abyss,the Brutes' rescue beacons recently activated. Anyone willing to investigate the beacons will be rewarded
MonsterMission.successmessage: You meet a representative of the company responsible for the production of the Brutes, he introduces himself and gives you [reward] Marks for the "inconvenience"; he then leaves as quickly as he arrived.

message.text: The missing Brutes appears to have been taken over by some sort of parasitic growth, but they have been dispatched . You should report the incident to [location2].

MonsterMission.name: Kill the mysterious creature
MonsterMission.description: Various Vessels have gone missing between [location1] and [location2].The only Witnesses suffer from heavy psychosis and hallucinations and thus we don't have a description of what's causing the disappereances,however a particular infrasonic signal has been marked as the prime suspect.Anyone willing to investigate the signal will be rewarded.
MonsterMission.successmessage: The Researchers of [location2] are particularly interested in the encounter and offer [reward] for your troubles

message.text: The Strange Creature has been terminated. You should report the incident to [location2].
